multipleChoiceExample.title: Pipe Material Selection
multipleChoiceExample.description: Select the best pipe material for underground water lines.
multipleChoiceExample.explanation: PVC pipes are preferred for underground water lines due to their corrosion resistance, lightweight nature, and cost-effectiveness.
hints: Think about materials that won't corrode underground

options.explanation: Galvanized steel can corrode over time when buried underground.
PVC is ideal for underground use due to its corrosion resistance and longevity.
Cast iron is heavy and can rust when exposed to moisture underground.
While durable, copper is more expensive and can be affected by soil conditions.
